Too Many Questions

posted by Zach Phillips

It’s been a little while now since we’ve done these spots, but I had hoped to have our new site up in time to show them off.

Alas, that hasn’t happened, but I wanted to have the latest stuff up on the site, so I won’t do a long description of these now, except to say that ab+c Creative Intelligence was a total pleasure to work with on these, and this shoot was a ton of fun.

It was also our company’s first shoot with the RED Epic.

The new site will have detailed descriptions and credits for all our stuff.

Posted Sunday, December 08
